8856.name: Tin
8856.description: Total output of tin, indexed to the year 1700 in log scale. It shows how much tin was produced relative to that in 1700 when measured on a log scale.
8856.datasetName: Output of key industries in England - using Bank of England (2017)
8856.s_name: Output of key industries in England - using Bank of England (2017)

source.name: Output of key industries in England - using Bank of England (2017)
source.dataPublisherSource: Broadberry, S., Campbell, B. M., Klein, A., Overton, M., & Van Leeuwen, B. (2015). British economic growth, 1270–1870. Cambridge University Press.
source.additionalInfo: This dataset is produced using 'A4. Ind Production 1270-1870' sheet in BoE dataset. For each variables, output figures are indexed those in year 1700 (i.e. 1700 = 100), and they are measured on a log scale.
